## About me - Skills

Hi there! My name is Jack Gramlich. This is my personal wesbite where you can view my blog which contains on my projects (under "work" in the navigation bar), hobbies, and updates on my professional career. I am an Economics and Data Analytics student. I have experience coding in Python & R for explanatory data analysis, data visulization, web scraping, and machine learning modeling using Scikit-learning package & Keras package. I also have expierence using excel & gretl for econometric analysis and predictive modeling. <br>
 
In my free time, I like following financial markets, reading-up on global economic news, and following sport statistics.
